channel.title: DTO
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from DTO, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Hamas accepts proposed deal for ceasefire with Israel and hostage release: Reuters
item.description: Hamas has agreed to a ceasefire proposal with Israel that includes the return of half the hostages held in Gaza and Israel's release of some Palestini...

item.title: Trump puts onus on Zelenskyy to end conflict with Russia ahead of meeting
item.description: In a post on Truth Social, Trump said that Zelenskyy could "end the war with Russia almost immediately, if he wants to, or he can continue to fight."

item.title: Stocks often rise the week of Fed’s Jackson Hole meeting. Don’t count on it now.
